pullrequest.title: Add model editor selection events and delete menu option

content.raw: Looks good, just one inconsistency: I noticed that if I hold control and click on the joint/link visuals, I can't select both joints and links at the same time, but if I hold control and click on items in the palette, I can select both item types simultaneously.
content.html: Looks good, just one inconsistency: I noticed that if I hold control and click on the joint/link visuals, I can't select both joints and links at the same time, but if I hold control and click on items in the palette, I can select both item types simultaneously.
